comments.comment: Lol typical mind controlling believes, Buddhism is far greater than this , there are simple questions can be asked, if we have so much clean n boasted Buddhism why our country n religion itself is so corrupted, ? Would a next Buddha choose such place n people? Thailand had spread more Buddhism than Sri Lankans to the world, not even single Sri Lankan monk or person had written a book about Buddhism that sold millions internationally.  Lets cut the crap, Buddhism aka its depth can be understood by practical people with emotional intelligence  we are nowhere there yet, whoever the idiot postef this vid has no idea of what true teachings of Buddha.
comments.author: Ceylon Shiping

replies.replyComment: ube thaththa suddek da sinhalen liyapiyako
